    Function awe_webview_set_callback_open_external_link

    Assign a callback function to be notified when an external link is attempted to be opened. An external link is any link that normally opens in a new window in a standard browser (for example, links with target="blank", calls to window.open(url), and URL open events from Flash plugins).

    @param webview The WebView instance.

    @param callback A function pointer to the callback.

    Prototype

    void awe_webview_set_callback_open_external_link(
  awe_webview* webview,
  extern(C) void function(awe_webview*, const(awe_string)*, const(awe_string)*) callback
) extern(C);
